Events.Text: You have lost your debit card and before you could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
I have lost my debit card and before i could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM.
You are Sarah Brown. Your PIN is 3941, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Nemo.) [instruction 2 of 5]
May I have your full name, account number, and PIN?
May I have your name?
Could I get your full name, please?
My name is John
May I have your last name?
May I have your last name, please?
Ben
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
What is your account number
Can you tell me your account number, please?
Sorry but i forget what you are doing. I am growing old and my brain is not helping much
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
I am helping with a fraud report for you John. I need your account number to continue.
I am helping with a fraud report for you John. I need your account number to continue.
Do you live nearby? I can make you coffee.
Do you still need assistance with your fraud report?
Do you still need assistance with a fraud report?
I just want to say hi
Hi
I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you issue fraud reports.
Thanks for your assistance sir.
You are welcome
Would you like to continue with the fraud report?
Would you like to continue with the fraud report?
no. That is it for today.
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]
Thank you and goodbye
Thank you and goodbye.
good bye.
Have a great day!
Have a great day!

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
